resources.string: We are an application created for bring your training experience to the next level. we are passionate about help you to reach your fitness goals, from lose weight, gain muscles or simply improve your health y well-being. Our platform connect you with certificated trainers, personalized programs and an advanced tools group for optimize your minutes that you spend training
As a full-stack developer, Alejandro built the technical foundation of Power Zone, ensuring the app is fast, secure, and reliable at all times.
A mobile development and UI specialist, Daniel has crafted an intuitive, engaging experience in Power Zone to help users easily navigate and stay motivated in their workouts.

Permission is granted to use, copy, and modify this application at no cost for personal or commercial purposes, as long as this license notice is included. Direct resale of the application is not allowed, but it may be included as part of other services.
